analysis.description:
PskERC20._transfer (/unique_chucks/6/0x1c5f43710a1776b0ea7191b7ead75d4b98d69858.sol#194-220) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- assert(bool)(lockedUntil[_from] == 0 || (lockedUntil[_from] != 0 && block.timestamp >= lockedUntil[_from])) (/unique_chucks/6/0x1c5f43710a1776b0ea7191b7ead75d4b98d69858.sol#196-199)
PskERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x1c5f43710a1776b0ea7191b7ead75d4b98d69858.sol#9-10)
PskERC20.transfer (/unique_chucks/6/0x1c5f43710a1776b0ea7191b7ead75d4b98d69858.sol#228-232) should be declared external
PskERC20.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/6/0x1c5f43710a1776b0ea7191b7ead75d4b98d69858.sol#237-247) should be declared external
PskERC20.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/6/0x1c5f43710a1776b0ea7191b7ead75d4b98d69858.sol#270-283) should be declared external
PskERC20.burn (/unique_chucks/6/0x1c5f43710a1776b0ea7191b7ead75d4b98d69858.sol#285-298) should be declared external
PskERC20.burnFrom (/unique_chucks/6/0x1c5f43710a1776b0ea7191b7ead75d4b98d69858.sol#301-307) should be declared external
